about.details:
Incorporated in 1987, Aarvi Encon Limited ia an ISO 9001:2008 and OHSAS certified Company provides engineering and manpower outsourcing services in India and internationally. The company offers IT staffing, manpower outsourcing/technical staffing/manpower deputation, project management, construction supervision, procurement assistance/expediting, inspection, pre-commissioning and commissioning, operation and maintenance and shutdown services. Cllient list included Reliance Industries, Cairn India, HPCL Mittal, Bechtel etc.

It serves oil and gas, power, LNG, PNG, refinery, petrochemical, pipeline, wind power, solar power, offshore, exploration and production, infrastructure, ports and terminal, telecom, fertilizer, cement, automobile, metro and mono rail, railway, metal and mineral, information technology industries.

faqs.question: What is the Aarvi Encon IPO?
faqs.answer:
Aarvi Encon IPO is a SME IPO of 3934000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹21.24 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹54 per share. The minimum order quantity is 2000.

The IPO opens on September 21, 2017, and closes on September 26, 2017.

Bigshare Services Pvt Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on NSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Aarvi Encon IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Aarvi Encon IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Aarvi Encon IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Aarvi Encon IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Aarvi Encon IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Aarvi Encon IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Aarvi Encon IPO opens on September 21, 2017 and closes on September 26, 2017.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Aarvi Encon IPO?
faqs.answer: Aarvi Encon IPO lot size is 2000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,08,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Aarvi Encon IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Aarvi Encon IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.
